description: This file is a header file defining the interface and data structures for the BSP Run-time Execution Engine (BREE) component, including conditional inclusion of resource management functions and external dependencies.

methods.name: BreeSpoCookedResOpen
methods.description: Opens a resource file with specified filename and mode flags.

methods.name: BreeSpoCookedResClose
methods.description: Closes a previously opened resource handle.

methods.name: BreeSpoCookedResRead
methods.description: Reads data from an open resource handle into a buffer.

methods.name: BreeSpoGetCookedResLength
methods.description: Returns the length of the resource associated with a handle.

methods.name: BreeSpoCookedResSeek
methods.description: Seeks to a specific position within a resource.

methods.name: BreeSpoCookedResWrite
methods.description: Writes data to an open resource handle.
